Title: No Smoking
Writer: Raj Singh Chaudhary (story), Anurag Kashyap (story), Anurag Kashyap (screenplay)
Actors: John Abraham, Ayesha Takia, Paresh Rawal, Ranvir Shorey
Plot: A surreal story about a man, his addiction of smoking, and a mysterious and powerful organisation, which claims to cure such addictions, though through very unusual ways.
